snippet.title: [Unity 5] Legacy - Third Person Adventure Game - Dev Diary #2
snippet.description:
Legacy is a Third Person Shooter-Adventure and Puzzle solving Game made by one person using Unity 5 Game Engine. 

The story of the game is still in progress and it will be revealed in future Dev Diaries.
The action will be an episodic one, each episode will contain some scenery, monument or location from the real word and also some historical accuracy. 

This video is meant to showcase some more basic mechanics such as AI, shooting, weapon switching/reloading, footsteps sounds based on the painted texture and so on.

Both the level design and game mechanics are still in Alpha state as this is the first compiled build and they will be improved over time.

Please Share, Like and Subscribe.

Intro music: https://soundcloud.com/generdyn/
Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/generdyn/
Outro: Setuniman @Freesounds.org
